item.title: Household income behind political participation
item.description: Author: Shijie Sun Abstract: Income situation matters for our lives in almost all aspects, including living standards, consumption ideas, and investment preference. In this analysis, I use two variables related to income in the CES datasets. I find that for most of the participants, they are willing to answer the income question, and the participantâ€™s income is close to the data provided by Statistics Canada. Introduction On June 13rd, 2019, Toronto Raptors won their first NBA championship in the 2019 NBA Finals.
